revised_title: Idiot's Stomach Contents and Medical Cases: A Chirurgical Study
tldr: This article presents two medical cases: one about an idiot who swallowed various objects, including nails, screws, and other metal items, which were found in his stomach after his death, and another about a large tumor on a child's thigh. The author discusses the surgical procedures and observations made in these cases, providing insights into the medical practices of the time.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical Case Studies
